TextView.android:text: This is a really simple app to use as each tab is self-contained. Simply add two of the variables to calculate the third! For example, to calculate the mins per mile pace for a run (RUN (MI) tab), add the total time for the run (e.g. 41 mins and 6 seconds) and the distance (6.2 miles or select the 10km option), then click 'Get Pace'. Cyclists do the same with 'Get Speed'.
Mile or KM splits for run pace tabs are displayed in the scroller below the user fields. They are subject to rounding, so may be a TINY bit off...
